availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas S. Jones (Caldwell co, ky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Rebecca J. Roberts Jones in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on February 28, 1849. Father of William W. Jones, Sarah F. Jones, Thomas Jones, James Jones, and John Jones. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Employed Dallas Hammock as a farmhand in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 283A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 58.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 273.
